results.title: Notch receptor expression in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected human umbilical vein endothelial cells treated with benznidazole or simvastatin revealed by microarray analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Parasitic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010272 @@@Parasitic infection@@@ produces differential expression of a set of genes in HUVECs treated with @CHEMICAL_benzonidazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C009999 @@@benznidazole@@@ alone or a combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@.

citations.NLM: Campos-Estrada C, González-Herrera F, Greif G, Carillo I, Guzmán-Rivera D, Liempi A, Robello C, Kemmerling U, Castillo C, Maya JD. Notch receptor expression in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected human umbilical vein endothelial cells treated with benznidazole or simvastatin revealed by microarray analysis. Cell Biol Int. 2020 May;44(5):1112-1123. PMID: 31943572
citations.BibTeX: @article{31943572, title={Notch receptor expression in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected human umbilical vein endothelial cells treated with benznidazole or simvastatin revealed by microarray analysis.}, author={Campos-Estrada C and González-Herrera F and Greif G and Carillo I and Guzmán-Rivera D and Liempi A and Robello C and Kemmerling U and Castillo C and Maya JD}, journal={Cell Biol Int}, volume={44}, number={5}, pages={1112-1123}}

results.title: Low doses of simvastatin therapy ameliorate cardiac inflammatory remodeling in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected dogs.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduced heart expression and serum levels of @GENE_IFNG @GENE_403801 @@@interferon-gamma@@@ (@GENE_IFNG @GENE_403801 @@@IFN-gamma@@@) and @GENE_TNF @GENE_403922 @@@tumor necrosis factor-alpha@@@ (@GENE_TNF @GENE_403922 @@@TNF-alpha@@@) but not @GENE_IL10 @GENE_403628 @@@interleukin-10@@@ (@GENE_IL10 @GENE_403628 @@@IL-10@@@), possibly favoring @<m>DISEASE_Parasitic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010272 @@@blood parasitism@@@ but reducing @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in the left ventricle and right atrium.

citations.NLM: Melo L, Caldas IS, Azevedo MA, Gonçalves KR, da Silva do Nascimento AF, Figueiredo VP, de Figueiredo Diniz L, de Lima WG, Torres RM, Bahia MT, Talvani A. Low doses of simvastatin therapy ameliorate cardiac inflammatory remodeling in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected dogs. Am J Trop Med Hyg. 2011 Feb;84(2):325-31. PMID: 21292909
citations.BibTeX: @article{21292909, title={Low doses of simvastatin therapy ameliorate cardiac inflammatory remodeling in Trypanosoma cruzi-infected dogs.}, author={Melo L and Caldas IS and Azevedo MA and Gonçalves KR and da Silva do Nascimento AF and Figueiredo VP and de Figueiredo Diniz L and de Lima WG and Torres RM and Bahia MT and Talvani A}, journal={Am J Trop Med Hyg}, volume={84}, number={2}, pages={325-31}}
